channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-23306] RESET command does not work if there is a config set by System.getProperty
item.description:
If a property set is restricted by hive.conf.restricted.list and the setting is set by system property, then RESET command fails with:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot modify hive.query.max.length at runtime. It is in the list of parameters that can't be modified at runtime or is prefixed by a restricted variable
item.summary: RESET command does not work if there is a config set by System.getProperty

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: In HS2 reset should not reset system property based settings. These should not be considered as something changed by the user.
